Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'The Staff of Hermes Trismegistus|Staff's knowledge had begun to impart on Kassandra, but there were still new lessons to learn. If she was going to complete Aletheia's trials, more power would have to be sourced from the Keeper's Insights in the underworld.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' - 'The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades'
MemoryInfobox.location:
Birth Cave of Kronos, The Scorched Lands, the Underworld
Hall of Maniai, Mourning Fields, the Underworld
Den of Judgment, Chasm of Torment, Hades

General_Description: '''The Next Lesson''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and gathered all three [[Keeper's Insight]]s.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' - ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades]]''
